name: Nightmare Hunt (Shadowwolf26)
description: This game is made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.  You are a dream fighter, fighting nightmares to eliminate nightmares from humanity's dreams forever. The game is a top down shooter, with W,A,S and D as movement keys, and left click button as shoot. The enemies get progressively harder, but you become more attuned to your powers as the game goes on, strengthening your weapons.
